statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age, email FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT user_id, email, investment_preferences->'risk_level' AS risk_level FROM users WHERE investment_preferences @> '{"risk_level": "high"}';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE investment_preferences->>'risk_level' = 'high' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE investment_preferences @> '{"investment_type":"stocks"}' AND email NOT LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, income FROM users WHERE income < 50000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, age, income FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, SUM(amount) AS total_investment FROM users JOIN investments ON users.user_id = investments.user_id GROUP BY name;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN investments ON users.user_id = investments.user_id WHERE income > 50000 AND amount > 10000;
SELECT name, gender, investment_name, amount FROM users JOIN investments ON users.user_id = investments.user_id WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, occupation FROM users WHERE occupation = 'Engineer';
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, investment_id FROM user_investments ORDER BY user_id ASC, investment_id DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE amount > 10000;
SELECT name, occupation FROM users WHERE occupation = 'Engineer';
SELECT user_id, investment_id FROM user_investments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN user_investments ON users.user_id = user_investments.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, account_balance FROM users WHERE age >= 30;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM users ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, age, account_balance FROM users WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, investment_name, amount_invested, date_invested FROM users JOIN investments ON users.user_id = investments.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, account_balance FROM users WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY account_balance DESC

SELECT users.first_name, investments.investment_name, date_invested FROM users JOIN investments ON users.user_id = investments.user_id WHERE investments.amount_invested > 5000 ORDER BY date_invested ASC
SELECT user_id, risk_tolerance, preference_id FROM preferences WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY preference_id
SELECT user_id, investment_name, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 4 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_recommendations FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_recommendations > 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT investment_name, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 2 AND preference_name LIKE '%color%' ORDER BY preference_name;
